editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Images 2l-90l: Gospel of John, Wängel zä-Yoḥanǝs, ወንጌል፡ ዘዮሐንስ፡, incomplete at the beginning (covered by illuminations), arranged for the days of the week: Monday (probably under the illumination on image 1r), Tuesday (24r), Thursday (59r), Friday (74r), Sunday (82r), . M. G. Wechsler, Evangelium Iohannis Aethiopicum, CSCO 617, SA 109 (2005). Images 90l: Image of Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, Mälk‘a Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, መልክአ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡, incomplete at the end (illumination over text). Répertoire 196. MG 553ff. Images 91r-95r: Mystagogia, Tǝmhǝrtä Ḫǝbu‘at, ትምህርተ፡ ኅቡዓት፡. HTexte 48–72; Textes 40–52; Me‘erāf I 215–7; MG 9ff. Images 96l-100r: Introduction to the Miracles of Mary, መቅድመ: ተአምረ: ማርያም: ዘሙዓልቃ:. Images 101l: Synaxarium entry for Miyazya 23 on Saint Roqo (ሮቆ). Images 101r-103l: Bandlet of Righteousness, Lǝfafä Ṣǝdǝq, ልፋፈ፡ ጽድቅ፡. Bandlet, EurBinde. Images 103r-104l: Asmat prayer which Jesus Christ gave to Saint Peter. Images 104l-107r: Asmat prayer against the suffering of death, ጸሎት በእንተ ፃዕረ ሞት. Images 107r-108r: Prayer for the Journey to Heaven, ጸሎት፡ ዘመንገደ፡ ሰማይ፡, cf. Fusella (1966 and 1994). Images 108r-xxx: Excerpt from 1 John. Illuminations added recently over text. Image 89r: mentions the owner, ሀብተ ሚካካኤል, and "ጸሐፊሁ (scribe) ወልደ ግሩም ወአቡሁ ወልደ ዮሐንስ." Image 101l mentions owner, ሀብተ ሚካካኤል and other names ወልደ ጊዮርጊስ, ወለተ ሚካኤል.
